title: The King of France Sending a Messenger to the King of Spain
description: The King of France Sending a Messenger to the King of Spain; Master of the Copenhagen Caesar (Flemish, active about 1475 - 1485); Bruges, Belgium; about 1480 - 1483; Tempera colors, gold leaf, gold paint, and ink on parchment; Leaf: 48 x 35 cm (18 7/8 x 13 3/4 in.); Ms. Ludwig XIII 7, fol. 352v; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
